title: Can not update to new patch!!!
body:
So the new patch (6.23) came out and i have been trying to update my client but every time i try, it shows up **"Update Failed - unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information." **

I have tried to look through the logs but have no idea what i am looking for. Haven't been able to play league because of this so someone send help please!

replies.body: Well  i installed the League Hextech Repair Tool and it fixed the problem but now i'm having Maestro Error and id\ have no idea what to do now...

Same thing for me, it's been like this for +2 days now.
I even submitted a ticket over 30 hours ago, but no one from the support tried to help me?
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/24386575?flash_digest=e9598e14c8f6b23f674095b95ac7e85564c31e07
What percent are you getting the unspecified error?  This will help figure out what the issue is exactly.  Let me know!

it Doesnt start .... same error
I deleted every single file... re-install and the same ....
